content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][block_title title=”Mobile Applications”][/block_title][vc_column_text]Mobility has and continues to change the way government agencies operates on a day to day basis, creating an opportunity for government to be more efficient and responsive. At OSI, we pride ourselves in our ability to not just deliver code, but to develop high quality Mobile applications, meeting the client’s specifications while ensuring data integrity and security requirements are met.

Mobility has and continues to change the way government agencies operates on a day to day basis, creating an opportunity for government to be more efficient and responsive. At OSI, we pride ourselves in our ability to not just deliver code, but to develop high quality Mobile applications, meeting the client’s specifications while ensuring data integrity and security requirements are met.

We follow an Agile methodology that provides clients unique insights while we collect requirements, design, test and develop applications. This approach allows our business analysts and mobile developers to work with clients to adapt to new requirements before delivery of a final product. Our understanding of mobile and web based technology empowers us to bring a level of expertise like no one else.

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_text_separator title=”Technologies”][list icon=”moon-square”][list_item title=”Apple iOS”][list_item title=”Android OS”][/list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_text_separator title=”Services”][vc_column_text]• Native Mobile Application Development

• Cross-platform design and development

• Usability and Experience

• Architecture design

• Responsive Design

• Creative Design

• O&M

• Content Management Integration[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Our team of business analysts and mobile developers have had over 4+ years of experience and have worked on projects for:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][media alignment=”center” image=”2532″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][media alignment=”center” image=”2462″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
